Provides a Cloud Firewall Control Policy resource.

For information about Cloud Firewall Control Policy and how to use it, see [What is Control Policy](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/138867.htm).

> **NOTE:** Available in v1.129.0+.

{{% examples %}}

## Example Usage

{{< chooser language "typescript,python,go,csharp" / >}}





{{< example csharp >}}

```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AliCloud = Pulumi.AliCloud;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var example = new AliCloud.CloudFirewall.ControlPolicy("example", new AliCloud.CloudFirewall.ControlPolicyArgs
        {
            AclAction = "accept",
            ApplicationName = "ANY",
            Description = "example",
            Destination = "100.1.1.0/24",
            DestinationType = "net",
            Direction = "out",
            Proto = "ANY",
            Source = "1.2.3.0/24",
            SourceType = "net",
        });
    }

}
```


{{< /example >}}


{{< example go >}}

```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi-alicloud/sdk/v3/go/alicloud/cloudfirewall"
	"github.com/pulumi/pulumi/sdk/v3/go/pulumi"
)

func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := cloudfirewall.NewControlPolicy(ctx, "example", &cloudfirewall.ControlPolicyArgs{
			AclAction:       pulumi.String("accept"),
			ApplicationName: pulumi.String("ANY"),
			Description:     pulumi.String("example"),
			Destination:     pulumi.String("100.1.1.0/24"),
			DestinationType: pulumi.String("net"),
			Direction:       pulumi.String("out"),
			Proto:           pulumi.String("ANY"),
			Source:          pulumi.String("1.2.3.0/24"),
			SourceType:      pulumi.String("net"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```

## ControlPolicy Resource Properties {#properties}

To learn more about resource properties and how to use them, see [Inputs and Outputs]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) in the Architecture and Concepts docs.

### Inputs

The ControlPolicy resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) properties:



{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="aclaction_csharp">
<a href="#aclaction_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Acl<wbr>Action</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The action that Cloud Firewall performs on the traffic. Valid values: `accept`, `drop`, `log`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="applicationname_csharp">
<a href="#applicationname_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Application<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The application type that the access control policy supports.If `direction` is `in`, the valid value is `ANY`. If `direction` is `out`, the valid values are `ANY`, `HTTP`, `HTTPS`, `MQTT`, `Memcache`, `MongoDB`, `MySQL`, `RDP`, `Redis`, `SMTP`, `SMTPS`, `SSH`, `SSL`, `VNC`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="description_csharp">
<a href="#description_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Description</a>
</span>

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The description of the access control policy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="destination_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The destination address defined in the access control policy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"
            title="Required">
        <span id="destinationtype_csharp">

</span>

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}DestinationType. Valid values: If Direction is `in`, the valid values are `net`, `group`. If `direction` is `out`, the valid values are `net`, `group`, `domain`, `location`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-required"

## Look up an Existing ControlPolicy Resource {#look-up}

The following state arguments are supported:


{{% choosable language csharp %}}
<dl class="resources-properties"><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_aclaction_csharp">
<a href="#state_aclaction_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Acl<wbr>Action</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The action that Cloud Firewall performs on the traffic. Valid values: `accept`, `drop`, `log`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_acluuid_csharp">
<a href="#state_acluuid_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Acl<wbr>Uuid</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The unique ID of the access control policy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_applicationname_csharp">
<a href="#state_applicationname_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Application<wbr>Name</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The application type that the access control policy supports.If `direction` is `in`, the valid value is `ANY`. If `direction` is `out`, the valid values are `ANY`, `HTTP`, `HTTPS`, `MQTT`, `Memcache`, `MongoDB`, `MySQL`, `RDP`, `Redis`, `SMTP`, `SMTPS`, `SSH`, `SSL`, `VNC`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_description_csharp">
<a href="#state_description_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Description</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The description of the access control policy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_destport_csharp">
<a href="#state_destport_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Dest<wbr>Port</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The destination port defined in the access control policy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_destportgroup_csharp">
<a href="#state_destportgroup_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Dest<wbr>Port<wbr>Group</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The destination port address book defined in the access control policy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_destporttype_csharp">
<a href="#state_destporttype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Dest<wbr>Port<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The destination port type defined in the access control policy. Valid values: `group`, `port`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_destination_csharp">
<a href="#state_destination_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Destination</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The destination address defined in the access control policy.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_destinationtype_csharp">
<a href="#state_destinationtype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Destination<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}DestinationType. Valid values: If Direction is `in`, the valid values are `net`, `group`. If `direction` is `out`, the valid values are `net`, `group`, `domain`, `location`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_direction_csharp">
<a href="#state_direction_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Direction</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Direction. Valid values: `in`, `out`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_ipversion_csharp">

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The ip version.

        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}DestPortGroupPorts. Valid values: `en`, `zh`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_proto_csharp">
<a href="#state_proto_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Proto</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Proto. Valid values: ` TCP`, ` UDP`, `ANY`, `ICMP`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_release_csharp">
<a href="#state_release_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Release</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Specifies whether the access control policy is enabled. By default, an access control policy is enabled after it is created. Valid values: `true`, `false`.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_source_csharp">
<a href="#state_source_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Source</a>

    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Source.

            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_sourceip_csharp">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The source ip.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="state_sourcetype_csharp">
<a href="#state_sourcetype_csharp" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">Source<wbr>Type</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}SourceType. Valid values: If `direction` is `in`, the valid values are `net`, `group`, `location`. If `direction` is `out`, the valid values are `net`, `group`.
{{% /md %}}</dd></dl>

## Import


Cloud Firewall Control Policy can be imported using the id, e.g.

```sh
 $ pulumi import alicloud:cloudfirewall/controlPolicy:ControlPolicy example <acl_uuid>:<direction>
```
